alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Logan; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 6:30PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wichita, southeastern Wallace, southwestern Logan and northeastern Greeley Counties through 615 PM MST/715 PM CST/... At 530 PM MST/630 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Tribune, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Wichita, southeastern Wallace, southwestern Logan and northeastern Greeley Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
